articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Russia
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Russia
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Korean books were donated to Russia.
					 They included works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and picture albums introducing the history and culture of Korea and the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 A book-donating ceremony took place at the Partizansk City Central Library on June 11.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the assembly and administration of the city and the library and masses.
					
					 Khmelyov, chairman of the Partizansk City Assembly, said that he was pleased to receive the donation of Korean books in the year of the Russia-DPRK friendship, adding that the books would help deepen the friendship between the peoples of the two countries and contribute to the development of the bilateral relations.

articles.title: European External Action Service Delegation Here
articles.content:
European External Action Service Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the European External Action Service headed by Gerhard Sabathil, director for Northeast Asia and Pacific, arrived here Friday.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University on Friday, the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party and state, the chairperson of a friendly party and members of the leadership bodies of the Party Central Committee in Pyongyang City.
					
					The participants laid bouquets before the statute of Kim Jong Il at the university and paid tribute to him.
					
					They went round revolutionary historical data and relics which bear witness to the leadership exploits the peerlessly great persons performed by making tireless efforts to develop the university into the highest seat of Juche-based education and a reliable center for training native cadres.
					
					They also looked round historic data conveying the exploits anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk performed by working heart and soul to develop the university.
					
					They were briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and conducted a dynamic drive for establishing the party's ideological system in the days of his revolutionary activities at the university.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments and schools in Pyongyang as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					 They made bows towards the statues.
					
					 Floral tribute was paid to the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in different parts of Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio in the name of units of the KPA, organs and industrial establishments.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children in various parts of the country visited the statues and portraits of the President and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Friday.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and portraits of smiling leaders in different places.
					
					 A revolutionary drama "A Letter from a Daughter" was staged at the National Theatre, an art performance was given by  the National Folk Art Troupe at the Ponghwa Art Theatre and a circus performance of the National Circus was staged at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Performances were given at the Jagang Provincial Art Theater and Hamhung Grand Theater.
					
					 Artistes in the North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces also staged performances.
					
					 There took place colorful sports and cultural events at construction sites, industrial establishments and farms across country.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Party and power bodies, ministries and national institutions sent wreaths to the Cambodian embassy here on Friday in memory of Prince Chea Sim, chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia. 
					 Laid before his portrait were wreaths sent by the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.
					
					 Present there were An Tong Chun, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kil Song, vice foreign minister, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, vice-director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased and made entries in a condolence book.

articles.title: Art Squad of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Squad of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Friday, the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					  Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as songs and dances "Campfire" and male duet "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party."
					
					  The performers sang high praises of the feats Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into the powerful guiding force of the Juche revolution and Songun revolution with brilliant idea and theory and outstanding leadership and demonstrating the dignity and might of the country and the nation before the world.
					
					  Also staged were numbers reflecting the firm determination of the young vanguard of Songun to uphold the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with loyalty.
					
					  The performance demonstrated the revolutionary enthusiasm and spirit of the young people to display the invincible stamina of the power of youth before the world under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students here.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet at Hungnam Port
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet at Hungnam Port
Hamhung, June 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Hungnam Port on Friday, the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The captain and crewmen of the Cambodia-flagged ship Gain Ocean were present at the meeting.
					
					 Speakers said that the most distinguished exploit performed by Kim Jong Il was that he developed the WPK into an invincible party and demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea before the world.
					
					 They expressed conviction that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in carrying out the historic cause of building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification, closely united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Construction of Sci-tech Complex Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Construction of Sci-tech Complex Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Sci-tech Complex in Ssuk Islet of Pyongyang progresses apace at a high speed.
					 Soldier-builders carried out over 80,000 cubic meters of concrete tamping, thus building the ground skeleton of the complex in 90 days.
					
					 At the same time, concrete tamping of the bridge No. 2 branching into Ssuk Islet was completed ahead of schedule.
					
					 Construction of cofferdam was successfully carried out. And the building of a hotel reached at 48 percent of its projects as of June 10.
					
					 Repairing of the Chungsong Bridge has been sped up with the introduction of new methods of construction and working.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has been also pushed forward to green the whole islet.

articles.title: Foreigners on Happy Life of Persons with Disabilities in DPRK
articles.content:
Foreigners on Happy Life of Persons with Disabilities in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting was sponsored by the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled (KFPD) in Pyongyang on June 18 on the occasion of the 2015 National Day of Persons with Disabilities. At the meeting, foreigners could see disabled persons enjoying happy life in the DPRK thanks to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 When interviewed by KCNA at the meeting, Michael John Gifford, British ambassador to the DPRK, said:
					
					 I was very impressed by the event today. I think that the KFPD is doing a good job in promoting the disabled's rights here in the DPRK. We have had long relationship with the KFPD. I want to show that continue. In particular, we are very pleased that the delegation of the disabled's performance was able to visit the UK a few months ago. I very much hope that kind of cultural cooperation would continue in order to build trust between the UK and the DPRK. Certainly we have seen a very talented performance and we enjoyed the performance. I enjoyed the performance very much today. 
					
					 Rajesh Chandra of the European Union Programme Support in the DPRK said:
					
					 The event was very good. And I can see the commitment and dedications of the KFPD and the government of the DPRK who are really working very hard to ensure that the people with disabilities are really participating in the meeting of the society.
					
					 Actually we are working in partnership with the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled and KFPD is our local partner and we are providing technical support to KFPD to implement various programme for the people with disabilities like physical rehabilitation and their inclusive educations. And there are so many programme which the KFPD is implementing in the DPRK.
					
					 In the near future, together with the KFPD we are planning to improve the access of all kinds of services for people with disabilities to the nationwide.

articles.title: Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy in Memory of Chea Sim
articles.content:
Wreaths Sent to Cambodian Embassy in Memory of Chea Sim
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Party and power bodies, ministries and national institutions sent wreaths to the Cambodian embassy here on Friday in memory of Prince Chea Sim, chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia. 
					 Laid before his portrait were wreaths sent by the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.
					
					 Present there were An Tong Chun, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kil Song, vice foreign minister, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-Cambodia Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, vice-director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased and made entries in a condolence book.

articles.title: Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits
articles.content:
Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Party-Building Exploits
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading papers on Friday in editorials dedicated to the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)  praise his party-building exploits.
					 Rodong Sinmun says since the WPK was led by Kim Jong Il, its militant power and leadership ability remarkably increased and a great heyday was ushered in all fields of socialist construction in the era of the WPK.
					
					 With his extraordinary ideo-theoretical wisdom and energetic leadership, Kim Jong Il carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea of the Juche-oriented party building and his exploits in all spheres, ushering in a great heyday in the development of the WPK and dynamically advancing the socialist cause and paving a broad avenue to the building of a thriving nation, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 He regarded it as an overriding principle of the party activities to take deep care of the destiny of the popular masses in a responsible manner and made every possible effort to provide them with a worthy and happy life.
					
					 He performed exploits in building the party into a guardian of people's fate. What occupies a distinguished place in them is that he developed the WPK into a force guiding the Songun revolution. 
					
					 He formulated the building of leadership art as an independent sphere of party-building for the first time in the history of building a socialist ruling party and wisely steered the work for putting it into practice.
					
					 It was one of his great party-building exploits that he developed the party into a promising party in which succession to the leadership is fully ensured.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that his immortal revolutionary exploits will last forever along with the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up National Defense Capability with Nuclear Force as Pivot
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up National Defense Capability with Nuclear Force as Pivot
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Vorontsov, section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, said when interviewed by the broadcasting service Sputnik recently that the U.S. is pushing the DPRK to the action to bolster up its nuclear force. 
					 Experts of different countries on the Korean affairs are unanimous in their views that the DPRK's access to nukes was an established fact, a natural outcome of the U.S. constant threat,  and the former's nuclear force cannot but be bolstered up unless those countries concerned responsible for it make efforts to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in an article in this regard: 
					
					 This is a proper comment on the historic background against which the DPRK was compelled to have access to nuclear deterrence and the present situation where it had no other option but to go in the direction of bolstering up the nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK's status as a nuclear weapons state remains unchanged no matter how the U.S. and its followers denies it and the former will never give up the measure to bolster up the nuclear force  because of someone's opposition. 
					
					 The DPRK will further increase its capability for self-defence with nuclear force as a pivot as long as the U.S. persistently clings to its anachronistic hostile policy towards the former. This is an invariable stand of the DPRK, the article concludes.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Denying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Denying Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Members of a civic organization for peace action held a memorial meeting before the girl's statue erected to condemn the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in Taejon on June 15 denouncing Japan for denying the sexual slavery, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					They called on the people to force the Japanese authorities to make an official apology and reparation for the sexual slavery so that the grudge of its victims is settled.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Moves for Biochemical Warfare under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Moves for Biochemical Warfare under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Citizens' Association for Recovering Our Land, Kunsan U.S. Forces Base held a rally before the U.S. forces base in Kunsan, North Jolla Province on June 17 and denounced the moves of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea for biochemical warfare, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 Speakers referred to the disclosure of the U.S. forces' anthrax germ experiment not only in Osan and Ryongsan but at their base in Kunsan.
					
					 They demanded the U.S. punish the chief culprits involved in the anthrax germ experiment and make an official apology for it.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Give Concert to Celebrate Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Give Concert to Celebrate Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Uruk Symphony Orchestra, an art troupe of Koreans in the U.S., gave a concert in New York on June 15, the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Among the audience were Koreans in the U.S., foreign diplomats at the UN and foreigners.
					
					 Prior to the concert, Ri Jun Mu, head of the orchestra, said it prepared the concert to commemorate the historic 15th anniversary of the event in which Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission, met the former south Korean President Kim Dae Jung and adopted the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Put on the stage were diverse numbers like trumpet solo "We Will Dedicate Our Lives to the Leader" and vocal solo "Let's Go to Mountains and Sea".
					
					 At the end of the concert, the performers and audience sang together song on the theme of reunification "Let's Meet Again".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Romanian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Romanian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on June 15.
					 The work published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which paved a new path for the revolutionary party building in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. It serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it indicates the way of developing the party into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud on June 5 allotted one whole page to an article titled "Immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in party building" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The paper noted that he regarded it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and successfully accomplished it in the whole period of leading the party. It went on:
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the WPK developed into the ideologically pure entity with the monolithic ideological system of the leader, into an integral organization and into the party which achieved the unity in actions.
					
					 He built the party into the one which forms the harmonious whole with the popular masses, takes care of them in a responsible manner and serves them faithfully.
					
					 The Indonesian paper International Media on June 12 in an article titled "WPK is the party which serves the people" said that the WPK always regards it as the iron rule to put the wishes and interests of the people above all and settle the matters on the basis of it.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania held a seminar, the Socialist Party of Romania a film show and the Women's Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola gave a lecture and the Ministry of Rural Development of Zamfara State in Nigeria organized a book exhibition from June 4 to 10.
					
					 On display at the venue of the book exhibition were books introducing revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books introducing successes made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched Korean film "Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification".
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania said that the June 15 joint declaration provided under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il brought hope for national reunification not only to the Korean people but also to the world progressives.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It is 15 years since the declaration was published but the situation on the Korean peninsula remains so tense that a war may break out any moment due to the anti-reunification acts of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The international secretary of the youth organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola noted in a lecture titled "Korean people's struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration" that the reunification of Korea is sure to be achieved thanks to Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the cause of the great leaders.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A Nepali national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was formed in Kathmandu on June 15.
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Observed by German and Brazilian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Observed by German and Brazilian Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- German and Brazilian organizations posted articles on their websites on June 12 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said in an article that leader Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of the national division in June, 2000 and made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration reflecting the ideal of By Our Nation Itself was adopted, thus ushering in the June 15 era of reunification in which the north and the south head for reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK said in an article titled "By Our Nation Itself":
					
					 It is fifteen years since the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration but the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the declaration, serves as an invariable banner for Korea's reunification.
					
					 This is because the idea of By Our Nation Itself is run through with the transparent spirit of independence.
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification should be settled by the efforts of the Korean nation in conformity with the will and requirements of the Korean nation.
					
					 The article stressed that the way of preserving and embodying the idea of By Our Nation Itself guarantees the reunification and prosperity of the Korean nation and peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Bulgarian Body
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Bulgarian Body
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special bulletin on June 10 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The bulletin carried the main contents of the declaration.
					
					 It said in an article:
					
					 Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Il signed the declaration together with the then south Korean President Kim Dae Jung.
					
					 The period in the wake of the adoption of the declaration witnessed an unprecedented era of reconciliation and cooperation in the north-south relations. There took place reunions of divided families and relatives from the north and the south, severed railways and roads were relinked and north-south joint cultural events were held. 
					
					 Another event of weighty importance in the north-south ties was that Kim Jong Il, together with the then south Korean President Roh Moo Hyun inked the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" on October 4, 2007.
					
					 The process of north-south reconciliation and cooperation was derailed due to the obstructions of the U.S. since Lee Myung Bak took power in south Korea.
					
					 Lee worked desperately to realize the wild ambition for "unification through absorption," totally denying the joint declarations and inciting confrontation with the north.
					
					 Such moves are going on under the present regime of south Korea.

articles.title: Lecture and Book and Photo Exhibition Held in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Lecture and Book and Photo Exhibition Held in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A lecture and book and photo exhibition on the theme of "National tradition of Korea" were held by the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee on June 9.
					 On display there were books and photos introducing the fine tradition and culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the committee, said:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the Korean people firmly preserved their own national identity and successfully carried forward the national cultural tradition.
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is adding brilliance to the fine tradition of the nation with noble patriotism.
					
					 The Korean people surely protect the dignity of the country and nation and achieve a final victory as they live full of pride and self-esteem of the nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Cuadros visitan museo de historia revolucionaria de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Cuadros visitan museo de historia revolucionaria de Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los miembros del organo de direccion del CC del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang visitaron el dia 19 el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguido en el plantel docente.
					
					Pasaron revista a los datos y objetos de historia revolucionaria que narran las hazanas de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu quienes se dedicaron por entero a fortalecer la universidad como centro supremo de autoctona educacion y fidedigna base de formacion de cuadros nacionales. 
					
					Vieron tambien otros datos que dan a conocer las proezas de Kim Jong Suk, Heroina de la Lucha Armada Antijaponesa, quien hizo ingentes esfuerzos por el fortalecimiento y desarrollo de ese plantel docente.
					
					Escucharon las explicaciones sobre el hecho de que desarrollando las actividades revolucionarias en la universidad, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il enriquecio la idea revolucionaria del Presidente con sus abnegadas actividades ideo-teoricas y se empeno por establecer en ella el sistema de ideologia partidaria.

articles.title: RPDC celebra 19 de junio
articles.content:
RPDC celebra 19 de junio
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea festejaron este viernes el 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Los militares, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares lo hicieron ante las estatuas de bronce y las imagenes sonrientes de los grandes lideres en la capitalina colina Mansu y otras localidades. 
					
					En los teatros centrales y locales tuvieron lugar las funciones artisticas. 
					
					En el Teatro Nacional de Drama en la capital se ofrecio la funcion de drama revolucionario "Carta de la hija", en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa, la funcion del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional, y en el Circo de Pyongyang la funcion del Conjunto Circense Nacional. 
					
					En los teatros de arte de la provincia de Jagang y en el Gran Teatro de Hamhung las funciones de los conjuntos artisticos provinciales. 
					
					Los artistas de las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y Hamgyong del Norte tambien presentaron las escenas de funciones de alto nivel ideologico y artistico. 
					
					Se realizaron diversas actividades deportivas y culturales en los organismos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y lugares de construccion.

articles.title: Periodicos alaban proezas de Kim Jong Il en construccion del Partido
articles.content:
Periodicos alaban proezas de Kim Jong Il en construccion del Partido
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 51o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los periodicos coreanos publicaron en sus ediciones de este viernes los editoriales alabando sus proezas acumuladas en la construccion del partido. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala:
					
					Desde el dia de inicio del trabajo del Dirigente en el Comite Central del PTC, se ha fortalecido extraordinariamente la capacidad combativa y directiva de esta organizacion politica y abierto la era dorada del PTC en todos los dominios de la construccion socialista. 
					
					Con la clarividente inteligencia ideo-teorica e incansables esfuerzos fisicos y mentales el Dirigente continuo y desarrollo globalmente la autoctona idea y las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung en materia de la construccion del partido. De esta manera, abrio la era de prosperidad en el desarrollo del PTC, llevo adelante la causa socialista y preparo la buena perspectiva de construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					Presento como supremo principio de las actividades del partido atender con responsabilidad el destino de las masas populares e hizo todo lo posible por asegurar la vida feliz al pueblo. 
					
					La proeza mas notable del Dirigente es que el fortalecio el PTC como fuerza orientadora de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					Por primera vez en la historia de la construccion del partido socialista en el poder, formulo el establecimiento de arte de direccion del partido como esfera independiente de la construccion del partido y dirigio sabiamente la labor para realizarlo. 
					
					El Dirigente desarrollo el PTC como partido prometedor que asegura con firmeza la continuidad de la direccion, lo cual es su otra hazana en la construccion del partido.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que seran eternas generacion tras generacion las proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente junto con la prosperidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
